Message:
“I was bound to die
by my own power,
so I’m glad I made it in time.

As we part ways, I’ll crystalize
my power and leave it with you.
Using it should allow
even you to die.”

“Even a cursed power
can save others.
Power may take
the shape of a monster,
but at its heart is a human.

That is what I wanted to
prove to you.”

“You are my solace.
Thanks to you,
I can die as a human.

I wish that you may also be
blessed with a happy death.”

With those last words,
she turned to dust,

leaving behind a single
white flower that lay
at her feet.

She really was a selfish
person until the very end.

I felt her warmth in the flower
as I held it in my hands,

and tears that were once dry
ran down my cheeks.
